LanguageData.JRWMeganeura.label: Meganeura
LanguageData.JRWMeganeura.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #03827-1893 [MEGANEURA MONYI] CODENAME: NEURON >167
A large extinct species of dragonfly. Their wings are extremely detailed and are covered in a large network of veins spread across the translucent membrane. Quick and pretty.
